A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It seems to me\, this movie is either loved it or hated it\, nothing in between\, seems to show this currently in the ratings at 58% I’m a HUGE Star Wars fan since 1977 when New Hope came out. While this movie give you some nostalgia\, it seems to me they are starting a New Star Wars with this movie\, whereas The Force Awakens was all about nostalgia. This movie takes risks\, and I appreciate it and unexpected twists. Was it perfect? No\, what movie is? I think the intro of new characters are to help transition between the old and new and might be leading into the new trilogy of Star Wars. One thing I didn’t like was the almost forced humor sometimes but it didn’t bother me too much and I was able to overlook it. Visuals were amazing! Great story with several OH SHIT moments. GO SEE IT!
